Class ExamService

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.service.ExamService
public class ExamService extends Object
Service class for managing exams and related operations Provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting exams as well as handling student exam submissions and grading

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ExamService()
    Creates a new ExamService instance and establishes a database connection

    • createExam

      public boolean createExam(Exam exam) throws SQLException
      Creates a new exam in the database
      Parameters:
      exam - the exam object to create
      Returns:
      true if creation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • addQuestion

      public int addQuestion(Question question) throws SQLException
      Adds a question to an exam
      Parameters:
      question - the question to add
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created question, or -1 if creation failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
